睇英超有時見到有飛機/直昇機 banner



香港可唔可以做呢種？

Search 過有間 heliservice 有短trip可租唔知掛唔掛得banner，間野淨係見 partner with 香港某酒店嘅玩樂 package多

外國有公司有做呢種service，可能係世界各地有 local arms

Sd左個request 俾間公司問緊

http://www.superbowladvertising.com/

入面有得問 quote

On 1 July 2019, there will be a flag raising ceremony in Wan Chai, Hong Kong, initiated by the Hong Kong pro-Beijing Government celebrating the 22nd year since handover of Hong Kong to China. However, due to China’s persistent breach of the autonomy of Hong Kong, suppression of freedom of speech, violation of human rights of the Hong Kong people, the handover is rather an exercise of domestic colonialisation. The recent amendment of extradition bill proves further Chinese intervention and its potential threat to global liberty.

As a group of protestors, we arr examining all means to voice out our concern during the 1 July ceremony. As Hong Kong Police has already blocked land and sea route to the ceremony venue, we would like to see if your strategic partner in aerial advertisement has presence in Hong Kong and we look forward to receive a quote from you. Thanks.
